auth.name: Name
auth.thePasswordMustContain: The password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
auth.youCanChangeThis: You can change this in the settings
auth.pinMustContainAtLeast4Digits: PIN must contain at least 4 digits
auth.pinMustContainAMaximumOf6Digits: PIN must contain a maximum of 6 digits
auth.phoneMustBeInFormat: Phone number must be in the format: code country + number. Example 38XXXXXXXXXX
auth.weHaveSentYouCodeByEmail: We have sent you a confirmation code by email. Please enter the code to proceed
auth.weHaveSentYouCodeToYourPhone: We have sent you a code to your phone. Please enter this code to proceed
auth.sendPasswordResetCodeToYourEmail: Send password reset code to your email
auth.registerOrNotDescription: If you continue without registering, your records will be lost if you uninstall the application or transfer it to another device.
auth.wantToDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
auth.loseAllRecords: You will lose all your records. This action cannot be undone.

description.part1: Hello! I am Nemory, your smart diary and faithful assistant on the path of self-development.
description.part2: Here, you can easily record your events, thoughts, moods, and goals, and I will help you:
description.list2: - analyze records and give personalized advice
description.list3: - plan and monitor your goals and habits
description.list4: - track your mental and physical health through daily records
description.list5: - foresee how your life will change if you continue in the same direction
